title: Hello Counselor
resume: Hello Counselor is a South Korean reality show first that debuted in November 2010. It is hosted by Shin Dong-yup, Lee Yeong-ja, and Cultwo (Jeong Chan-wu, Kim Tae-gyun). It is a talk show with an emphasis on regular people, regardless of age or gender, that aims to help take down communication barriers by sharing stories about life.
